title: Eminem's daughter Hailie Mathers looks every bit her father's daughter in new Instagram selfie
text:
An impressive 1.7 million people follow Hailie Scott Mathers, 23, on Instagram, often commenting on her assortment of lifestyle, travel and fashion posts.

And she posted, the subject of a number of her dad Eminem's songs, a new photo on Tuesday that showed off her make-up skills all while looking just like dad.

Accompamying the stunning snap was a caption reading: 'i tried harder than i’d like to admit to get a “golden hour” photo today...☀️(sic)'.

Fierce: The subject of a number of her dad's songs, Hailie Scott Mathers posted a new photo on Tuesday that showed off her makeup skills all while looking just like Eminem

In the photo, Mathers can be seen wearing a lime green top as her sleek brunette locks cascade over her shoulders.

She's wearing a number of different silver necklaces as well as two pairs of silver hoop earrings.

What's most notable is her makeup, which consists of a dewy foundation with rosey eyeshadow, a matching pink pout, lush lashes, and black cat eye liner.

The post has garnered more than 115,000 likes and counting.

Twins! Aside from the gussied up glam, the recent college grad bears a striking resemblance to her father, 46-year-old rapper Eminem

Followers took to the photo to compliment her makeup.

'Ur makeup and whole vibe is [fire emoji](sic),' one follower wrote.

'I was gonna say you're so beautiful but I don't want to get diss by Em (sic),' another commented.

Aside from the gussied up glam, the recent college grad bears a striking resemblance to her father, 46-year-old rapper Eminem.

Social media maven: The 23-year-old often showcases her makeup and fashion skills on social media, though she's said she's not yet ready to launch a career and she's unsure if she'll ever want to live in the spotlight (posted September 19)

The brunette has become a rising star on Instagram since graduating from Michigan State University in June.

Eminiem shares Mathers with his two-time estranged ex-wife Kimberly Scott, 44.

For years the hip hop mogul featured lyrics in several songs about his young daughter, so she has been well known to his fans since she was a baby.

He also adopted two daughters with Scott: Whitney Scott Mathers, 17, and Alaina Marie Mathers, 26.

As reported by DailyMail Reporter Katy Forrester last year, Hailie Scott Mathers has little interest in becoming a musician like her dad and is more drawn to the beauty world.

She often showcases her makeup skills on social media, though she's said she's not yet ready to launch a career and she's unsure if she'll ever want to live in the spotlight.
